lantern_ability.hold: Drop a bomb from above that explodes after {{bombTime}} second.  Deals {{damage}} damage and can interrupt Behemoths.
Fires a lightning bolt in a direction that deals {{shockDamage}} Shock damage multiple times as it passes through enemies.
Create a fire ball in front of you that explodes after {{fireBallTime}} seconds, dealing {{blazeDamage}} Blaze damage to all nearby enemies.
Dash in a direction, deal {{terraDamage}} Terra damage to nearby enemies upon arrival, and gain {{percentLifesteal}}% lifesteal for {{lifestealTime}} seconds.
Create a frost pillar in front of you that deals {{frostDamage}} Frost damage to nearby enemies over {{damageTime}} seconds.
Grants a {{shield}} hit point shield that lasts {{shieldTime}} seconds.
Creates an aura that grants nearby Slayers {{percentIncreasedMovementAndAttackSpeed}}% increased move speed and attack speed for {{attackSpeedTime}} seconds.

Surrounds the slayer in swirling stone that deals {{terraDamage}} Terra damage to nearby enemies for {{damageTime}} seconds. Also generates {{shield}} hit point shields per second that expire after {{shieldTime}} seconds. (Max {{maxShield}} shields)
